name: Bloom
description:
'Bloom' is the wistful yet fresh atmosphere of an spring day. The sakura trees gently rustle and the train approaches the platform.

SAUâ€™s train series of artworks is an artistic exploration of the liminal qualities of Japanese trains and stations. He aims to capture the fleeting moments of joy in everyday life, in a place where transition, change and adventure is always happening.

I hope that through these pieces, you will feel that brief moment vicariously too.

Created by SAU on May 1, 2019
Procreate
4800x4800px
